title: Launcher auto shutdown after 17% and starts to download at 0% again
body: Hi guys, please help me with my problem. I download league of legends installer and have try to install it many time but it still stop at 16-17%, auto close the launcher and when I open it up, it starts to download again from the beginning. I tried to delete all of the files and started again many time but it still has the same problem. I have wasted 10 hours on downloading it so please help me. Thank you so much.

replies.body:
Don't manually delete any files, it may cause you more trouble.  Getting stuck this early suggests a security setting that's not allowing your game files from being accessed or written.  Run through the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help.

You may want to then download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) next and perform a force repatch to fix up any potentially messed up files.
